sentence.Network_en: The hunter-gatherer lifestyle today survives precariously in remote regions.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天狩猎采集的生活方式在偏远地区侥幸留存了下来。

sentence.Network_en: He was eventually installed as official local news - gatherer of the town.
sentence.Network_cn: 后来他被派正式担任本市的新闻采访员.

sentence.Network_en: In addition, most hunter - gatherer societies today have a panoply of deities.
sentence.Network_cn: 除此之外, 现在社会中的很多狩猎者都很信奉神灵.

entry.def: A gatherer is someone who collects or gathers a particular thing.

example.ex: The brazil nut gatherers were paid only 2 to 3 percent of the New York wholesale price.
example.tran: 这些巴西果采摘者所卖的钱仅为纽约批发价格的2%到3%。

sentences.sentence: "they were a society of hunters and gatherers"

means.word_mean: 2. a person who is employed to collect payments (as for rent or taxes)

auth_sentence.content: He eats like a Paleolithic hunter-gatherer and exercises daily.
